```{r echo=TRUE,eval=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
install.packages("jsonlite")
install.packages("ggplot2")
install.packages("plyr")
library(jsonlite)
library (plyr)
library (ggplot2)
url  <- 'https://api.github.com/'                          
path <- 'search/repositories'                                
searchJan <- '?q=created%3A%222016-01-01+..+2016-01-31%22'     
searchFeb <- '?q=created%3A%222016-02-01+..+2016-02-28%22'     
searchR <- '+language:r'                                    
pageNo <- '&page=1'                                          
pageSize <- '&per_page=100'                                    
URLJan <-paste0(url, path, searchJan, searchR, pageNo, pageSize)
URLFeb <-paste0(url, path, searchFeb, searchR, pageNo, pageSize)
l = jsonlite::fromJSON(URLJan)
df<-data.frame(l)
df
```
